episode.title: Deposit Guaranty National Bank of Jackson v. Roper

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have two judgments and opinions to announce for the Court.
The first is in 904, Deposit Guaranty National Bank of Jackson, Mississippi against Roper.
And for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for Fifth Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist and Mr. Justice Stevens have filed concurring opinions.
Mr. Justice Blackmun filed an opinion concurring in the judgment.
Mr. Justice Powell joined by Justice Stewart filed a dissenting opinion in this case.
